00001 #ifndef POPUP
00002 #define POPUP
00003 #include <Wt/WCompositeWidget>
00004 #include <Wt/WContainerWidget>
00005 #include <Wt/WIntValidator>
00006 #include <Wt/WText>
00007 #include <Wt/WLineEdit>
00008 #include <Wt/WPushButton>
00009 #include <Wt/WWidget>
00010 #include <Wt/WFlags>
00011 #include <Wt/WSignal>
00012 #include <Wt/WValidationStatus>
00013 #include <Wt/WDatePicker>
00014 #include <Wt/WDateTime>
00015 #include <Wt/WGroupBox>
00016 #include <string>
00017 #include <boost/version.hpp>
00018 #include <trex/domain/IntegerDomain.hh>

00020 using namespace TREX::utils;
00021 using namespace TREX::transaction;
00022 
00023 namespace TREX {
00024   namespace witre {
00025         class Goalpopup : public Wt::WCompositeWidget {
00026             private:
00027             Wt::WContainerWidget* attributes;
00028             Wt::WCompositeWidget* root;
00029             Wt::WLineEdit* start;
00030             Wt::WLineEdit* startEnd;
00031             Wt::WLineEdit* duration;
00032             Wt::WLineEdit* durationEnd;
00033             Wt::WLineEdit* end;
00034             Wt::WLineEdit* endEnd;
00035             Wt::WPushButton* ok;
00036             Wt::WIntValidator* numRange;
00037             Wt::WIntValidator* middleRange;
00038             Wt::Signal<transaction::IntegerDomain, transaction::IntegerDomain, transaction::IntegerDomain> finished_;
00039             Wt::Signal< > cancelled_;
00040             //Validators of information
00041             Wt::WValidationStatus* valS;
00042             Wt::WValidationStatus* valD;
00043             Wt::WValidationStatus* valE;
00044 
00045             void cancel() { cancelled_.emit(); };
00046             void okStatus(bool val) { if(valS->valid()&&valD->valid()&&valE->valid()) ok->enable(); else  ok->disable(); };
00047             void done()
00048             {
00049                 transaction::IntegerDomain s(string_cast(IntegerDomain::minus_inf,start->text().toUTF8()),string_cast(IntegerDomain::plus_inf,startEnd->text().toUTF8()));
00050                 transaction::IntegerDomain d(string_cast(IntegerDomain::minus_inf,duration->text().toUTF8()),string_cast(IntegerDomain::plus_inf,durationEnd->text().toUTF8()));
00051                 transaction::IntegerDomain e(string_cast(IntegerDomain::minus_inf,end->text().toUTF8()),string_cast(IntegerDomain::plus_inf,endEnd->text().toUTF8()));
00052                 finished_.emit(s,d,e);
00053             }
00054 
00055             public:
00056             Wt::Signal<transaction::IntegerDomain, transaction::IntegerDomain, transaction::IntegerDomain>& finished() { return finished_; };
00057             Wt::Signal< >& cancelled() { return cancelled_; };
00058             void setPosition(Wt::WWidget* input) { this->positionAt(input, Wt::Vertical); };
00059             void clear() { start->setText(""); duration->setText(""); end->setText(""); };
00060             const void setHide() { this->setHidden(true); return; };
00061             const void setVisable() { this->setHidden(false); return; };
00062             void valRange(int bottom, int top)
00063             { numRange->setTop(top); numRange->setBottom(bottom); middleRange->setTop(top);};
00064             void clearText() { start->setText(""); startEnd->setText("");
00065                                duration->setText(""); durationEnd->setText("");
00066                                end->setText(""); endEnd->setText(""); };
00067 
00068             Goalpopup(Wt::WContainerWidget* parent = 0, int current=0, int final=10)
00069                 :Wt::WCompositeWidget(parent), finished_(this)
00070                 {
00071                     root = this;
00072                     this->setImplementation(attributes = new Wt::WContainerWidget());
00073                     this->setPopup(true);
00074                     this->setHidden(true);
00075                     this->setPositionScheme(Wt::Fixed);
00076                     this->decorationStyle().setBackgroundColor(Wt::WColor("silver"));
00077                     this->decorationStyle().setBorder(Wt::WBorder(Wt::WBorder::Solid,Wt::WBorder::Medium,Wt::WColor("black")));
00078 
00079                     numRange = new Wt::WIntValidator(current,final);
00080                     middleRange = new Wt::WIntValidator(1,final);
00081 
00082                     //Start attribute
00083                     attributes->addWidget(new Wt::WText("Start"));
00084                     start = new Wt::WLineEdit(attributes);
00085                     start->setEmptyText("minus_inf");
00086                     start->setValidator(numRange);
00087                     start->setMargin(10, Wt::Left);
00088                     new Wt::WText(" < ", attributes);
00089                     startEnd = new Wt::WLineEdit(attributes);
00090                     startEnd->setEmptyText("plus_inf");
00091                     startEnd->setValidator(numRange);
00092                     new Wt::WBreak(attributes);
00093                     //Duration attribute
00094                     new Wt::WText("Duration", attributes);
00095                     duration = new Wt::WLineEdit(attributes);
00096                     duration->setEmptyText("minus_inf");
00097                     duration->setValidator(middleRange);
00098                     duration->setMargin(10, Wt::Left);
00099                     new Wt::WText(" < ", attributes);
00100                     durationEnd = new Wt::WLineEdit(attributes);
00101                     durationEnd->setEmptyText("plus_inf");
00102                     durationEnd->setValidator(numRange);
00103                     new Wt::WBreak(attributes);
00104                     //End attribute
00105                     new Wt::WText("End", attributes);
00106                     end = new Wt::WLineEdit(attributes);
00107                     end->setEmptyText("minus_inf");
00108                     end->setValidator(numRange);
00109                     end->setMargin(10, Wt::Left);
00110                     new Wt::WText(" < ", attributes);
00111                     endEnd = new Wt::WLineEdit(attributes);
00112                     endEnd->setEmptyText("plus_inf");
00113                     endEnd->setValidator(numRange);
00114                     new Wt::WBreak(attributes);
00115                     //ValidateStatus
00116                     valS = new Wt::WValidationStatus(start);
00117                     valS->validated().connect(this, &Goalpopup::okStatus);
00118                     valD = new Wt::WValidationStatus(duration);
00119                     valD->validated().connect(this, &Goalpopup::okStatus);
00120                     valE = new Wt::WValidationStatus(end);
00121                     valE->validated().connect(this, &Goalpopup::okStatus);
00122 
00123 
00124                     //Buttons
00125                     ok = new Wt::WPushButton("Enter",attributes);
00126                     ok->clicked().connect(root, &Wt::WWidget::hide);
00127                     ok->clicked().connect(this, &Goalpopup::done);
00128                     ok->setMargin(10,Wt::Right);
00129 
00130                     Wt::WPushButton* reject = new Wt::WPushButton("Cancel",attributes);
00131                     reject->clicked().connect(root, &Wt::WWidget::hide);
00132                     reject->clicked().connect(this, &Goalpopup::cancel);
00133 
00134                 };
00135 
00136 
00137         };
00138   }
00139 }
